title: Personalized Learning Path for Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing
description: This learning path is designed for individuals with some familiarity with basic concepts in Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing who prefer reading materials and note-taking to enhance their understanding. The path aims to help learners achieve certification in these areas through a minimal time commitment of 1-2 hours per week.

milestones.title: Understanding Computer Vision Basics
milestones.description: Learn the fundamental concepts and applications of Computer Vision.

resources.title: Book: Computer Vision: Algorithms and Applications

skills_gained: Basic understanding of Computer Vision principles

milestones.title: Exploring Natural Language Processing Concepts
milestones.description: Dive into the key concepts and techniques used in Natural Language Processing.

resources.title: Book: Natural Language Processing in Action
Tutorial: Introduction to Natural Language Processing

milestones.title: Implementing Computer Vision and NLP Projects
milestones.description: Apply your knowledge by working on practical projects in both Computer Vision and NLP.
skills_gained: Hands-on experience in Computer Vision and NLP projects
